scripts.start-getJobs: node -e "console.log('Starting getJobs script'); setInterval(() => { require('child_process').execSync('ts-node src/scripts/getJobs.script.ts', {stdio:[0,1,2]}); }, process.env.TIME)"
scripts.start-createJobs: node -e "console.log('Starting createJobs script'); setInterval(() => { require('child_process').execSync('ts-node src/scripts/createJobs.script.ts', {stdio:[0,1,2]}); }, process.env.TIME)"
scripts.start-collections: node -e "console.log('Starting collections script'); setInterval(() => { require('child_process').execSync('ts-node src/scripts/collections.script.ts', {stdio:[0,1,2]}); }, process.env.TIME)"
